name: osv_scan_local
command: NO_PROXY='*' HTTPS_PROXY='' HTTP_PROXY='' https_proxy='' http_proxy='' artifacts/bin/osv-scanner scan -r .

name: trivy_image
command: echo 'docker image scan skipped; no docker engine'

name: trivy_fs_secret_misconfig
command: NO_PROXY='*' HTTPS_PROXY='' HTTP_PROXY='' https_proxy='' http_proxy='' artifacts/bin/trivy fs --scanners secret,misconfig --skip-db-update --timeout 10m .

name: trivy_fs_vuln_attempt
command: NO_PROXY='*' HTTPS_PROXY='' HTTP_PROXY='' https_proxy='' http_proxy='' artifacts/bin/trivy fs --scanners vuln,secret,misconfig --timeout 10m .
